es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.rec.runner

Interface RecommendationRunner<U,I>

  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    I - type of the items
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRecommendationRunner, CandidatesRecommendationRunner, FastFilterRecommendationRunner, FilterRecommendationRunner

    public interface RecommendationRunner<U,I>
    Recommendation runner. Implementing classes provide convenient ways of generating recommendations according to a specific recommendation evaluation methodology and storing/printing them.
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run(Recommender<U,I> recommender, OutputStream out)
      Runs the recommender and prints the recommendations to an output stream.
      default void run(Recommender<U,I> recommender, String path)
      Runs the recommender and stores the recommendations in a file.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        default void run(Recommender<U,I> recommender,
                 String path)
          throws IOException
        Runs the recommender and stores the recommendations in a file.
        Parameters:
        recommender - recommender to be run
        path - path of the file where the recommendations are saved
        Throws:
        IOException - when file does not exist or other IO error
